page.title: 09Ravenfield J & I School
page.content: Ravenfield school has{147 pupils, 5 {teachers, 1 Headmaster, 1 Secretary, 1 {Helper, 6 Dinner ladies, 2 cleaning {ladies, and 1 Caretaker.}There are 2 parts to the school. The{old building is{77 years old (1908);}the{new}is{15 {years old (1970). The school has changed a great deal since it opened in 1909. The main lessons then were{reading, {arithmetic,}and{composition.}We learn more things now such as{fractions, {decimals, P.E. singing and topics}etc. The school is quite far away from the village, old and new. Most people don't mind it too much at all. The only thing people are bothered about is the crossroads, but people don't mind it too much because there is a crossing lady. { {
